title: Kore wa Yoi Dakimakura
description: One day, Hazumi is asked to help with committee work by Itsuki, a stunning beauty with the face and figure of a model. When they enter a room alone together, Itsuki "confesses" (more like attacks) Hazumi. Seeing Hazumi confused and overwhelmed, Itsuki begins to explain her feelings and reveals her past. Will Hazumi be able to accept her and return her feelings?
